title: The Looming Tower
subtitle: Series 1: Episode 1
editorial_subtitle: Fighting an enemy – while at war with each other

synopses.small: FBI man John O’Neill seeks the help of a young Muslim agent.
synopses.editorial: How the rivalry between the FBI and CIA may have set the path for the tragedy of 9/11.

title: Bodies
subtitle: Series 1: Episode 1
editorial_subtitle: Box Set. Inside the dark underbelly of the NHS

synopses.small: Rob Lake starts work in a maternity unit and witnesses the negligence of an obstetrician.
synopses.editorial: Underfunded, under pressure – the shocking medical drama from the writer of Line of Duty.

title: Cardinal
editorial_title: Cardinal: By The Time You Read This
subtitle: By the Time You Read This: 1. Sam
editorial_subtitle: A truly personal case for John

synopses.small: Detective John Cardinal struggles to accept his wife's death.
synopses.editorial: Cardinal struggles to accept his wife’s death – and then receives messages blaming him.

title: Killed By My Debt
editorial_subtitle: He owed £130... but it ended up costing his life

synopses.small: The story of 19-year-old Jerome Rogers, who found himself under a crushing debt.
synopses.editorial: Jerome got his first job – but his debts began to spiral. BAFTA-award winning drama.

synopses.small: New Lyell Centre boss Thomas struggles to impress Nikki, Jack and Clarissa.
synopses.editorial: The forensics team who will stop at nothing to get answers for the dead.

title: MotherFatherSon
subtitle: Series 1: Episode 1
editorial_subtitle: Box Set. A fractured family – at the heart of power

synopses.small: Tragedy strikes a fractured family at the heart of politics and power.
synopses.editorial: Richard Gere stars in a fight for family, for truth – and for the heart of the nation.
